mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADCB_STATS_RANGE_MONTH(STAT_MONTH, A_STAT, B_STAT, C_STAT, D_STAT, E_STAT, F_STAT, G_STAT) VALUES (#{statMonth}, #{aStat}, #{bStat}, #{cStat}, #{dStat}, #{eStat}, #{fStat}, #{gStat})
mapper.select: SELECT STAT_MONTH, A_STAT, B_STAT, C_STAT, D_STAT, E_STAT, F_STAT, G_STAT FROM ADCB_STATS_RANGE_MONTH WHERE STAT_MONTH BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate};
